concept.title: Writing plans in language
concept.shortdesc: Plans allow you to run more than one task with a single command, compute values for the input to a task, process the results of tasks, or make decisions based on the result of running a task.

conbody.p: Write plans in the language, giving them a .pp extension, and place them in the module's /plans directory.
Plans can use any combination of functions or built-in functions.
